resources.string: This is the News Story Title
Failed to parse the HTTP Response
An error occured while trying to fetch News Story Data

Hello PropertyGuru! 

I've made this app in the most native way possible, using only basic Java and Android methods. No Library is being used for making the REST API calls. This is the most basic that I could have made it. Usually I would like to use helping libraries like GSON and Volley for handling these REST calls and their JSON response. Anyhow, it has been a good revision of my skills. Hope to hear from you soon! 

Usama K. Zafar
